tool.name: OpenSwathDecoyGenerator
tool.description: Generates decoys according to different models for a specific TraML
tool.command:
@QUOTE_FOO@ @EXT_FOO@ #import re
## Preprocessing mkdir in && ln -s '$in' 'in/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in.ext)' && mkdir out &&
## Main program call
set -o pipefail && @EXECUTABLE@ -write_ctd ./ && python3 '$__tool_directory__/fill_ctd.py' '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$args_json' '$hardcoded_json' && @EXECUTABLE@ -ini @EXECUTABLE@.ctd -in 'in/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in.ext)' -out 'out/output.${out_type}'
## Postprocessing && mv 'out/output.${out_type}' '$out' #if "ctd_out_FLAG" in $OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS && mv '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$ctd_out' #end if

param.label: Input file
Output file type -- default: determined from file extension or content
Decoy generation method
decoy tag
Whether to switch terminal K and R (to achieve different precursor mass)
Minimum fraction of decoy / target peptides and proteins
Number of decoys the algorithm should generate (if unequal to 1, the algorithm will randomly select N peptides for decoy generation)
shuffle: maximum attempts to lower the amino acid sequence identity between target and decoy for the shuffle algorithm
shuffle: target-decoy amino acid sequence identity threshold for the shuffle algorithm
shift: precursor ion MZ shift in Thomson for shift decoy method
shift: fragment ion MZ shift in Thomson for shift decoy method
MZ threshold in Thomson for fragment ion annotation
allowed fragment types
allowed fragment charge states
set this flag if specific neutral losses for detection fragment ions should be allowed
set this flag if unspecific neutral losses (H2O1, H3N1, C1H2N2, C1H2N1O1) for detection fragment ions should be allowed
set this flag if decoys should not be appended to targets
Overrides tool-specific checks
Enables the test mode (needed for internal use only)

param.name: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS
param.label: Optional outputs

data.name: ctd_out
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: ctd
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "ctd_out_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

tool.help:
Generates decoys according to different models for a specific TraML
For more information, visit https://openms.de/doxygen/release/3.1.0/html/TOPP_OpenSwathDecoyGenerator.html
